Profile API¶

Profile manipulation API

class api.views.profile.ProfileViewSet(**kwargs)[source]¶
Inherits standard characteristics from ModelViewSet:
Endpoint: /profiles/
Methods: GET / POST / PUT / PATCH / DELETE / OPTIONS
Permissions:
- Default : IsJWTOwner
- GET : IsJWTAuthenticated
- POST : IsJWTSelf

Overrides standard pre_delete() method to destroy address object simultaneously.

model¶

alias of Profile
